riskmetric_scores

Source: vignettes/riskmetric_scores.Rmd
riskmetric_scores.Rmd
library("val.report")

We generate the assessment with riskmetric and we load it as part of the report:

dplyr_assessment <- readRDS("assessments/dplyr.rds")

Then we can start working on the assessment. This is not a quantification of a risk like riskmetric::pkg_score() but some minor conversion to a value of length 1, one character or one numeric value.

list.files("assessments", full.names = TRUE)
#> character(0)
knitr::knit_exit()
# riskmetric_a <- assessment(riskmetric_assessment)
# dplyr_a <- assessment(dplyr_assessment)

# dplyr_a
# riskmetric_a
